intro: Hexonychia stellatum, commonly known as the starry hexonychia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its compact, succulent growth habit and produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange. It thrives in well-drained, sandy soils and is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments. Due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance, it is often cultivated as an ornamental plant in rock gardens and xeriscapes.
